Grand Magister Jurek: Please choose one of the following three types of crystals: [Quest Q00350_EnhanceYourWeapon 30115-09.htm|Red Soul Crystal] [Quest Q00350_EnhanceYourWeapon 30115-10.htm|Green Soul Crystal] [Quest Q00350_EnhanceYourWeapon 30115-11.htm|Blue Soul Crystal] Each crystal bestows a different power upon the weapon it enhances, and the powers may vary from weapon to weapon.
